data.prayer: Father, give the disciples of the the state of Oudômxai an urgency of seeing every people and place reached for the gospel.
data.verse: As long as it is day, we must do the works of him who sent me. Night is coming, when no one can work.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Oudômxai, Laos
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, see the suffering of your people in the state of Oudômxai. Deliver all those who have not forgotten your Word.
data.verse: Look on my suffering and deliver me, for I have not forgotten your law.

data.section_summary: On average, 71 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who are far from God in Oudômxai, Laos.
data.prayer: Jesus, reveal yourself to these new families.
Lord, teach the disciples in the state of Oudômxai to trust your Word, like a lamp, in the darkness around them.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp for my feet, a light on my path.

data.prayer: Father, put your Bible in the hands of the 264,911, who are far from you and live in this place.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your Word. I seek you with all my heart; do not let me stray from your commands.

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Thai, Northern people.
Spirit, sanctify the 6,997 believers in Oudômxai and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.

data.prayer: Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Oudômxai, Laos so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.

data.prayer: Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Oudômxai, Laos. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

location.name: Oudômxai
location.people_groups_list: Tamoy, Prai, Kuan, Khuen, Kiorr, Con
